content: Compose a sentence that exhibits an unparalleled level of aversion and disinclination towards executing a particular undertaking, utilizing a rhetorical device such as anthropomorphism, analogy, or exaggeration, requiring a complex thought process to decode.

With the fervor of a cat being dragged to a bath, my enthusiasm for tackling this task wanes to the point where even the most obstinate mountain would voluntarily crumble into the sea to avoid the burden of its own immovable existence.
